Home → Libraries → Enterprise + Innovation Hub

Enterprise + Innovation Hub

Tel: 01473 263827 · Email: hub@suffolklibraries.co.uk · Address: The Carnegie Room, Ipswich County Library, Northgate Street, Ipswich IP1 3DE

Supporting Suffolk’s aspiring entrepreneurs, business owners and creative minds

Book a space, machine or advisor →

Code club

Learn coding learn while using your imagination in creative projects. Bring your own laptop or use one of our library Chromebooks (tablets aren't suitable). For children aged 6-14, accompanied by an adult. Call 01473 263827 or email hub@suffolklibraries.co.uk for info.

Business advice

We have two New Anglia Growth Hub advisors working on a fortnightly, rotating basis. They advise on topics including exporting, digital support, intellectual property, finance, grants and vouchers and starting up a business.

Kurt Scheepers

Kurt is a business growth adviser for south-east Suffolk and specialises in grant funding and business management.

William Millar

William is a business growth advisor for Suffolk and specialises in innovation and digital.

Book an advisor →

MakerSpace

Situated in the Lab, our MakerSpace is an open, friendly public space to design and create. We offer a range of equipment including two 3D printers, a 3D scanner, two computer coding kits and two professional sewing machines.

Find out about our facilities in the MakerSpace.

Are you experienced with fashion and textile design, coding or 3D printers? We’re looking for skilled and enthusiastic volunteers to help support our newly built MakerSpace. Contact us at hub@suffolklibraries.co.uk or call 01473 263827 to get involved!

Book a machine →

Spaces for hire

Located on the second floor of Ipswich County Library, the Carnegie Room offers a variety of spaces perfect for business meeting and presentations.

The room has free WiFi, power points and a kitchen.
Day Hours
Monday 0900 - 1800
Tuesday 0900 - 1900
Wednesday 0900 - 1800
Thursday 0900 - 1800
Friday 0900 - 1900
Saturday 0830 - 1700
Sunday 1000 - 1600

Carnegie Room

You can hire the entire Carnegie Room by contacting hub@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Private hire - Advance booking (per hour)
£45.60

Lounge & presentation suite

The Lounge is packed with sofas and coffee tables, plus a dedicated hotdesk area. Also comes with a fully equipped presentation suite seating an audience of 15.

Private hire - Advance booking (per hour) Private hire - Walk-in booking (per hour)
£27.60 £29.60

Pods

Two glass rooms ideal for private meetings. Each pod contains a round table, four seats and flipcharts.

Advance booking (per hour) Walk-in booking (per hour)
£4.80 £6.80

Lab

Meeting space with whiteboard, table and 8 chairs.

Advance booking (per hour) Walk-in booking (per hour)
£18 £20
